name: Cultist

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft.  one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Cultists worship forbidden gods, devils, demons, and other sinister beings
actions.desc: Many cultists work to summon the object of their devotion to the world so it might grant them power and destroy their enemies.

special_abilities.name: Fanatic
special_abilities.desc: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened by creatures not in their cult.

document__title: Level Up Advanced 5e Monstrous Menagerie OGL
